cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iku

sentence.kanji: 日曜日は図書館に行きます。
sentence.romaji: nichiyoubi ha toshokan ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I go to the library on Sundays.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanojo

sentence.kanji: 彼女はOLです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha o-eru desu
sentence.english: She's an office worker.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mimi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は耳がよく聞こえません。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha mimi ga yoku kikoemasen
sentence.english: Her hearing isn't very good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oku

sentence.kanji: 彼はかばんをいすの上に置きました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaban wo isu no ue ni okimashita
sentence.english: He put the bag on the chair.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oto

sentence.kanji: 私の夫はサラリーマンです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no oto ha sarari-man desu
sentence.english: My husband is a company employee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kare

sentence.kanji: 彼は私の上司です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi no joushi desu
sentence.english: He's my senior.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinu

sentence.kanji: 犬が病気で死にました。
sentence.romaji: inu ga byouki de shinimashita。
sentence.english: Our dog got sick and died.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daijoubu

sentence.kanji: 大丈夫ですか。
sentence.romaji: daijoubu desu ka
sentence.english: Are you OK?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otokonoko

sentence.kanji: 男の子たちがサッカーをしている。
sentence.romaji: otokonokotachi ga saka- wo shite iru
sentence.english: The boys are playing soccer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saisho

sentence.kanji: 5ページの最初を見てください。
sentence.romaji: gope-ji no saisho wo mite kudasai
sentence.english: Please look at the beginning of page 5.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okonau

sentence.kanji: その会社は来月、キャンペーンを行う。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha ha raigetsu kyanpe-n wo okonau
sentence.english: That company is going to run a campaign next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toreru

sentence.kanji: シャツのボタンが取れた。
sentence.romaji: shatsu no botan ga toreta
sentence.english: My shirt button came off.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakitoru

sentence.kanji: 話しのポイントを書き取った。
sentence.romaji: hanashi no pointo wo kakitota
sentence.english: I wrote down the main points of what was said.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moteiku

sentence.kanji: 水を持って行きましょう。
sentence.romaji: mizu wo moteikimashou
sentence.english: Let's take some water with us.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houritsu

sentence.kanji: 新しい法律ができた。
sentence.romaji: atarashii houritsu ga dekita
sentence.english: A new law has been passed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyouryoku

sentence.kanji: このプロジェクトにはみんなの協力が必要です。
sentence.romaji: kono purojiekuto ni ha minna no kyouryoku ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: This project requires everyone's cooperation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nokoru

sentence.kanji: 料理がたくさん残りました。
sentence.romaji: ryouri ga takusan nokorimashita
sentence.english: A lot of food was left over.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakunitatsu

sentence.kanji: 私は人々の役に立ちたいと思っています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha hitobito no yakunitachitai to omote imasu
sentence.english: I want to be of service to others.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinan

sentence.kanji: 次男は今、海外にいます。
sentence.romaji: jinan ha ima kaigai ni imasu
sentence.english: My second son is abroad now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nokosu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はメッセージを残しました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha mese-ji wo nokoshimashita
sentence.english: She left a message.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uketoru

sentence.kanji: 彼からメールを受け取りました。
sentence.romaji: kare kara me-ru wo uketorimashita
sentence.english: I got an email from him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saidai

sentence.kanji: これは世界最大の船です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha sekai saidai no fune desu
sentence.english: This is the world's largest ship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seikou

sentence.kanji: ついに実験が成功した。
sentence.romaji: tsuini jiken ga seikou shita
sentence.english: The experiment finally succeeded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsureteiku

sentence.kanji: 私も連れて行ってください。
sentence.romaji: watashi mo tsurete ite kudasai
sentence.english: Please take me along.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tou

sentence.kanji: 党の代表が質問に答えました。
sentence.romaji: tou no daihyou ga shitsumon ni kotaemashita
sentence.english: The party spokesman answered the question.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's karera

sentence.kanji: 彼らはバスケットの選手です。
sentence.romaji: karera ha basuketo no senshu desu
sentence.english: They're basketball players.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikatetsu

sentence.kanji: 私は地下鉄で通勤しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha chikatetsu de tsuukin shite imasu
sentence.english: I commute to work by subway.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zouka

sentence.kanji: 島の人口は年々増加しています。
sentence.romaji: shima no jinkou ha nennen zouka shite imasu
sentence.english: The population of the island increases every year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakou

sentence.kanji: この工場では魚を加工している。
sentence.romaji: kono koujou de ha sakana wo kakou shite iru
sentence.english: This factory processes fish.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼はきれいな服に着替えた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kirei na fuku ni kigaeta
sentence.english: He changed into clean clothes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yaburu

sentence.kanji: 彼は約束を破った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yakusoku wo yabuta
sentence.english: He broke his promise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yabureru

sentence.kanji: シャツが破れている。
sentence.romaji: shatsu ga yaburete iru
sentence.english: My shirt got torn.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayaru

sentence.kanji: 去年はスニーカーが流行りました。
sentence.romaji: kyonen ha suni-ka- ga hayarimashita
sentence.english: Sneakers were popular last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kisoku

sentence.kanji: あの会社の規則は厳しいです。
sentence.romaji: ano kaisha no kisoku ha kibishii desu
sentence.english: That company's rules are strict.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oufuku

sentence.kanji: 往復切符をください。
sentence.romaji: oufuku kipu wo kudasai
sentence.english: I'd like a roundtrip ticket please.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukushuu

sentence.kanji: 昨日の復習をしましたか。
sentence.romaji: kinou no fukushuu wo shimashita ka
sentence.english: Did you review yesterday's lesson?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shumi

sentence.kanji: 私の趣味は映画とテニスです。
sentence.romaji: watashi no shumi ha eiga to tenisu desu
sentence.english: My hobbies are tennis and movies.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuki

sentence.kanji: 東京行きの列車に乗った。
sentence.romaji: toukyouyuki no resha ni nota
sentence.english: I got on the Tokyo-bound train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuwaeru

sentence.kanji: 塩、コショウを加えてください。
sentence.romaji: shio koshou wo kuwaete kudasai
sentence.english: Please add the salt and pepper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kibo

sentence.kanji: この動物園は日本一の規模です。
sentence.romaji: kono doubutsuen ha niponichi no kibo desu
sentence.english: This is the largest zoo in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doryoku

sentence.kanji: もっと努力しよう。
sentence.romaji: moto doryoku shiyou
sentence.english: Let's try harder.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoutai

sentence.kanji: 高校の時の先生を結婚式に招待した。
sentence.romaji: koukou no toki no sensei wo kekonshiki ni shoutai shita
sentence.english: I invited my high school teacher to the wedding.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hazukashii

sentence.kanji: とても恥ずかしかった。
sentence.romaji: totemo hazukashikata
sentence.english: It was very embarrassing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokui

sentence.kanji: 彼は歌が得意です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha uta ga tokui desu
sentence.english: He's good at singing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iki

sentence.kanji: 行きは新幹線で行った。
sentence.romaji: iki ha shinkansen de ita
sentence.english: I went by bullet train on the way over.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toru

sentence.kanji: 写真をたくさん撮りました。
sentence.romaji: shashin wo takusan torimashita
sentence.english: I took a lot of photographs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souchi

sentence.kanji: 実験にはこの装置を使います。
sentence.romaji: jiken ni ha kono souchi wo tsukaimasu
sentence.english: We use this device in our experiments.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokuchou

sentence.kanji: この曲線がこの車の特徴です。
sentence.romaji: kono kyokusen ga kono kuruma no tokuchou desu
sentence.english: These curves are a unique feature of this car.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chikara

sentence.kanji: お相撲さんは、みんな力持ちだ。
sentence.romaji: osumousan ha minna chikaramochi da
sentence.english: All sumo wrestlers are strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teinei

sentence.kanji: 彼女はいつも丁寧に仕事をします。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha itsumo teinei ni shigoto wo shimasu
sentence.english: She always works carefully.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaman

sentence.kanji: 彼のわがままには我慢できません。
sentence.romaji: kare no wagamama ni ha gaman dekimasen
sentence.english: I can't put up with his selfishness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaburu

sentence.kanji: 帽子を被って外出した。
sentence.romaji: boushi wo kabute gaishutsu shita
sentence.english: I went out wearing a hat.
